title: Return Policy Duration
text: Customers may return items within 30 days of delivery if they are unused, unwashed, and in their original packaging with all tags attached.

title: Return Shipping Fee
text: Customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the item arrived damaged or was incorrect due to our error.

title: Damaged Products
text: If a product arrives damaged, customers must report the issue within 48 hours by submitting photos and order details to our support team.

title: Refund Processing Time
text: Refunds are processed within 7 to 14 business days after we receive and inspect the returned item. Refunds are issued to the original payment method.

title: Non-Refundable Items
text: Certain items such as hygiene products, cosmetics, gift cards, and clearance sale items are not eligible for returns or refunds.

title: Order Cancellation
text: An order can be canceled within 2 hours of purchase unless it has already been packed or shipped. After shipment, cancellation is not possible.

title: Warranty Claims
text: Products with manufacturer warranty must be claimed directly through the brand's authorized service centers. Warranty duration varies by product.

title: Exchange Policy
text: Eligible items may be exchanged once for a different size or color, subject to stock availability. Exchanges must follow the same return conditions.

title: Late Delivery Compensation
text: If a delivery is delayed beyond the estimated date by more than 7 business days due to our logistics partner, customers may request a shipping fee refund.

title: Incorrect Address Responsibility
text: We are not responsible for delivery failures caused by incomplete or incorrect shipping addresses provided by the customer.
